T02TD3140E:34a-4: / de'i phyogs re re cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa mda' yab kyi mthar thug pa'i snam bu rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-5: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gcig dor nas thig go //
T02TD3140E:34a-6: de'i phyi ngos su cha chung bcu gnyis kyi lha snam dor nas thig go //
T02TD3140E:34a-7: lha snam 'di la padma bcu gnyis te re re zhing cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-8: de la cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i padma cha bdun byas nas dbus kyi cha ni lte ba'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-9: g-yas dang g-yon gyi cha dag ni 'dab ma bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-10: de'i g-yas dang g-yon du brgyad do //
T02TD3140E:34a-11: de'i g-yas dang g-yon dag bcu drug go //
T02TD3140E:34a-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum rnams kyi 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02TD3140E:34a-13: lha snam gyi thig las rtsi ngos su cha chung gcig dor bar rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02TD3140E:34a-14: thig gsum po 'di srid du zur thig gi bar du'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-15: rtsa ba'i thig gi tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu cha chung bcu gnyis sngon bzhin phyi ba las sgo cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no //
T02TD3140E:34a-16: de nas de'i sgo khyud la sogs pa nas rta babs kyi mthar thug ba rnams gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo khyud la sogs pa nyis 'gyur te chu'i khor yug gi phyed tshun chad do //
T02TD3140E:34a-17: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rta babs rnams kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus rnams su cha chung bcu gnyis pa'i shing rta rnams so //
T02TD3140E:34a-18: de nas sa'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-19: de'i phyi ngos su chu'i khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-20: de nas me'i 'khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-21: de nas rlung gi khor yug cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-22: rlung gi khor yug las phyi ngos su nam mkha'i khor yug cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:34a-23: khor yug de'i phyi ngos su 'od zer gyi phreng ba cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-24: sa'i khor yug la sogs pa drug po 'di rnams rang rang gi dang por thig zlum po'o //
T02TD3140E:34a-25: 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar yang ste thig zlum po bdun no //
T02TD3140E:34b-0: de lta bu 'di ni gtso bo thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum @34b gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3140E:34b-1: 'di'i thig skud la ni khru brgyad de sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD3140E:34b-3: gang gi tshe thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-4: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung bco brgyad yongs su brtags te /
T02TD3140E:34b-5: de'i drug cha la cha chung gi tha snyad byed pa de'i tshe /
T02TD3140E:34b-6: cha chung des gtso bo'i padma'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi phreng ba'i mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya'o //
T02TD3140E:34b-7: de'i tshe gtso bo thugs rdo rje dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor khru bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-8: de'i nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:34b-10: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje gsung rdo rje'i gnas su gyur nas gsung rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
T02TD3140E:34b-11: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa'i bkod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin du ste /
T02TD3140E:34b-13: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-15: de nyis 'gyur gsum pa yin pa de'i tshe khru bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-16: de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud ni khru sum cu so gnyis pa ste /
T02TD3140E:34b-17: sa'i khor yug gi dang po'i bar du'o zhes pa phyogs gsum pa'o//
T02TD3140E:34b-18: gang gi tshe dang por brjod pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-19: dang por brjod pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i tshad bsdoms nas sgo cha chung sum cur yongs su brtags te /
T02TD3140E:34b-20: de'i drug cha la cha chung du 'dogs pa de'i tshe /
T02TD3140E:34b-21: cha chung des gtso bo'i lte ba la sogs pa nas 'od kyi khor yug gi mthar thug par cha chung gi grangs bya zhing /
T02TD3140E:34b-22: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje yang sku rdo rje'i gnas su bya'o //
T02TD3140E:34b-23: sku rdo rje ni gtso bo ste /
T02TD3140E:34b-24: de las gzhan pa'i lha la sogs pa dgod pa ni phyogs dang po bzhin te /
T02TD3140E:34b-25: de'i tshe gtso bo sku rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bdag nyid khru nyi shu dang /
T02TD3140E:34b-26: de nyis 'gyur gyi thig skud kyang sa'i khor yug gi thog ma'i bar du khru bzhi bcu pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs bzhi pa'o //
T02TD3140E:34b-27: de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las thig skud khru brgyad pa zhes pa'i rtsa ba la khru brgyad pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur ro zhes bkral nas /
T02TD3140E:34b-28: de la dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02TD3140E:35a-1: gnyis su bya zhing thig skud ni khru nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:35a-2: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni khru bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD3140E:35a-3: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni khru nyi shu'o zhes pa ni thig skud nyis 'gyur gyi nges pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:35a-4: yang dbang gi don du dbus kyi dkyil 'khor tsam bri bar rjes su gnang ste /
T02TD3140E:35a-6: dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor ram ni rigs kyi dbang las phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par 'gyur /
T02TD3140E:35a-8: gang yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las sgo 'khor lo'i dgu cha dang /
T02TD3140E:35a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo'i bcu char gsungs pa de ltar ni slob dpon rnams kyis tha snyad mi byed pas na kho bos spangs so //
T02TD3140E:35a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang rab tu grags pa brjod kyi 'di tsam 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
T02TD3140E:35a-11: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis //
T02TD3140E:35a-12: 'dzam bu gling gi dbang phyug gam //
T02TD3140E:35a-13: 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po yis //
T02TD3140E:35a-14: kun nas dpag tshad mtha' ru ni //
T02TD3140E:35a-15: phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD3140E:35a-16: mkhas pas gdul bya'i skye bo yi //
T02TD3140E:35a-17: sems rnams yang dag bltas nas ni //
T02TD3140E:35a-18: 'dod pas tshad ni byas na yang //
T02TD3140E:35a-19: nyes pa cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD3140E:35a-21: lag ba'i mthil du bri byas na //
T02TD3140E:35a-22: bstan bcos las gsungs don byed de //
T02TD3140E:35a-23: sa steng sogs su smos ci dgos //
T02TD3140E:35a-25: dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa'i dbye ba tha dad ba rnams ji tsam zhig brjod cing bya bar nus //
T02TD3140E:35a-26: gang gi phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis //
T02TD3140E:35a-27: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin //
T02TD3140E:35a-28: rab tu bstan par su yis nus ;
T02TD3140E:35a-29: / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3140E:35a-30: dkyil 'khor brtag par grub pa yin //
T02TD3140E:35a-32: 'dir thig gdab pa'i bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02TD3140E:35a-33: shar sogs phyogs kyi thig le'i steng //
T02TD3140E:35a-34: srad bu bzung nas mandala bzhi'i //
T02TD3140E:35a-35: nya yi mgo dang mjug ma'i mthar //
T02TD3140E:35a-36: tshangs thig dang ni zur thig gdab //
T02TD3140E:35a-37: zur de sgo tshad bdun dang phyogs //
T02TD3140E:35a-38: khru la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i thig //
T02TD3140E:35a-39: dbus su brgyad cha phyi ba ste //
T02TD3140E:35a-40: sgo de'i bzhi cha chung ste //
T02TD3140E:35a-41: rtsa ba'i phyi rol gcig dang gnyis //
T02TD3140E:35a-42: gcig gnyis gcig dang gcig gi mthar //
T02TD3140E:35a-43: thig drug zur nas ngos su ste //
T02TD3140E:35b-0: tshangs las rim gyis ring @35b bar ni ;
T02TD3140E:35b-1: / cha chung gsum du dang bo'i thig //
T02TD3140E:35b-2: gnyis thig cha chung gnyis rtser reg //
T02TD3140E:35b-3: cha chung brgyad du gsum stegs bu'i //
T02TD3140E:35b-4: thig las drang po'i thig bzhi ste //
T02TD3140E:35b-5: gsum ni cha chung lnga bzhi pa //
T02TD3140E:35b-6: cha chung bzhi de'i dang po ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-7: ngos thig rtse mor yang dag reg //
T02TD3140E:35b-8: gsum ni cha chung re re'i bar //
T02TD3140E:35b-9: bzhi pa'i rtse nas ngos su thig //
T02TD3140E:35b-10: cha chung bcu dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:35b-11: rtsa ba'i rtse nas byung ba'i thig //
T02TD3140E:35b-12: cha chung bzhi pa ngos steng du //
T02TD3140E:35b-13: cha chung gnyis gnyis thad kar ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-14: cha chung brgyad de gsum 'khyog pa //
T02TD3140E:35b-15: ka ba'i rtse nas phyi ngos su //
T02TD3140E:35b-16: cha chung re re dor bar thig //
T02TD3140E:35b-17: bcu gcig 'di la lnga pa dag //
T02TD3140E:35b-18: bdun pa cha chung phyed dang gnyis //
T02TD3140E:35b-19: yang na gsum pa bdun pa dang //
T02TD3140E:35b-20: dgu pa cha chung re re'o //
T02TD3140E:35b-21: bzhi pa drug pa bcu pa rnams //
T02TD3140E:35b-22: so sor cha chung phyed phyed do //
T02TD3140E:35b-23: lnga ni cha chung phyed dang gnyis //
T02TD3140E:35b-24: de la phyogs gnyis su ni rgyar //
T02TD3140E:35b-25: tshangs ba'i g-yas dang g-yon du ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-26: cha chung phyed bcas mnga' yi mthar ;
T02TD3140E:35b-27: / snam bu cha chung phyed dang gsum //
T02TD3140E:35b-28: thig ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD3140E:35b-29: cha chung drug mthar gnyis pa dang //
T02TD3140E:35b-30: gsum pa cha chung gsum pa'o //
T02TD3140E:35b-31: cha chung bzhi mthar bzhi pa ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-32: cha chung lnga ste mda' phyed bcas //
T02TD3140E:35b-33: gsum dor nas ni phyed dang lnga //
T02TD3140E:35b-34: gsum nas drug pa cha chung lnga //
T02TD3140E:35b-35: bzhi ni cha chung bdun rnams te //
T02TD3140E:35b-36: thig bcu gcig pa cha chung lnga //
T02TD3140E:35b-37: snam bu lnga pa'i steng du ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-38: ngos su cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD3140E:35b-39: bdun pa'i 'og la cha chung gsum //
T02TD3140E:35b-40: steng gi cha chung drug steng du //
T02TD3140E:35b-41: snam bu rnams mthar son pa'i thig //
T02TD3140E:35b-42: gzhan gyi mtha' dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD3140E:35b-43: kyog po gcig go 'di nang du'ang //
T02TD3140E:35b-44: cha chung phyed nas de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD3140E:35b-45: de phyir cha chung rig byed mthar //
T02TD3140E:35b-46: thig zlum de nas gnyis yin te //
T02TD3140E:35b-47: cha chung gnyis gnyis dor bar ro //
T02TD3140E:35b-48: bzhi dor bar ni zlum po gzhan //
T02TD3140E:35b-49: 'gram logs sgo dang mnyam pa na //
T02TD3140E:35b-50: mun pa'i snam bu med pa'o //
T02TD3140E:35b-51: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur ni //
T02TD3140E:35b-52: ngos nyid du ste steng min pa //
T02TD3140E:35b-53: de tshe thig ni drang po gsum //
T02TD3140E:35b-54: stegs bu'i thig las de ltar gzhal //
T02TD3140E:35b-55: phyogs ni de ma thag pa yi //
T02TD3140E:35b-56: rta babs snam bu drag po'i las //
T02TD3140E:35b-57: dpangs su tshad ni sgo yi cha //
T02TD3140E:35b-58: nor lha nor lha'i nyi ma dang //
T02TD3140E:35b-59: rgyal ba nor lha rgyal ba dang //
T02TD3140E:35b-60: nyi ma nor lha nyi ma dang //
T02TD3140E:35b-61: rgyal ba nor lha go rims bzhin//
T02TD3140E:36a-0: @36a * // 'di rnams ngos kyis brjod par bya //
T02TD3140E:36a-1: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon du ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-2: cha chung phyed dang lnga dor nas //
T02TD3140E:36a-3: snam bu cha chung phyed dang gsum //
T02TD3140E:36a-4: thig ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD3140E:36a-5: gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-6: cha chung lnga nas cha chung gsum //
T02TD3140E:36a-7: bzhi pa cha chung bzhi dor nas //
T02TD3140E:36a-8: cha chung gsum mda' cha chung ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-9: byed dang bzhi nas phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD3140E:36a-10: gsum nas drug pa cha chung lnga //
T02TD3140E:36a-11: de nas gsum nas brgyad gcig ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-12: cha chung bdun de tha ma drug //
T02TD3140E:36a-13: de phyir cha chung rig byed mthar //
T02TD3140E:36a-14: zlum po gnyis nas de bzhin thig //
T02TD3140E:36a-15: cha chung gnyis mthar zlum po ste //
T02TD3140E:36a-16: tha ma cha chung bzhi pa'i mthar //
T02TD3140E:36a-17: tshangs las cha chung brgyad mthar dang //
T02TD3140E:36a-18: bdun pa'i mtha' ru zlum po'i thig //
T02TD3140E:36a-19: de nas yang dag drangs nas ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-20: phyogs gzhan thig gi mtshams song ba'i //
T02TD3140E:36a-21: thig gnyis rim bzhin tshangs pa'i phyir //
T02TD3140E:36a-22: cha chung gnyis gsum dor bar ro //
T02TD3140E:36a-23: phyi zlum thig las phyi ngos su //
T02TD3140E:36a-24: cha chung dor bar zlum po'i thig //
T02TD3140E:36a-25: de nas cha chung gsum dor nas //
T02TD3140E:36a-26: zur thig bar du gnas pa'i thig //
T02TD3140E:36a-27: kun du son ba'i tshangs thig dang //
T02TD3140E:36a-28: re'u mig snam bu'i re kh'a dbyi //
T02TD3140E:36a-29: rtsa ba'i nang gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD3140E:36a-30: lha yi dbye bas thig gdab pa //
T02TD3140E:36a-31: cung zad tha dad bde mchog gi //
T02TD3140E:36a-32: gzhan de de yis brjod par bya //
T02TD3140E:36a-33: tshangs dang zur thig gnas pa las //
T02TD3140E:36a-34: gzhan min de yi tshangs las phyir //
T02TD3140E:36a-35: cha chung gnyis dor rtsa ba'i bar //
T02TD3140E:36a-36: thig gdab zur gyi 'gram dag tu //
T02TD3140E:36a-37: de bzhin lte ba'i logs dag las //
T02TD3140E:36a-38: sgo ni bzhi bzhir de yi srid //
T02TD3140E:36a-39: lte ba'i phyi ru cha chung bzhi //
T02TD3140E:36a-40: dor bar cha chung bzhi pa'i thig //
T02TD3140E:36a-41: thad kar tshangs dang zur la gnas //
T02TD3140E:36a-42: 'dir ni yang ni thig lnga yang //
T02TD3140E:36a-43: cha chung gnyis gnyis dor bar ro //
T02TD3140E:36a-44: de bzhin de rnams dang drug pa //
T02TD3140E:36a-45: mtshams su yang dag son pa'o //
T02TD3140E:36a-46: tshangs pa dang ni zur thig gi //
T02TD3140E:36a-47: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i bdun rnams las //
T02TD3140E:36a-48: lnga pa gsum pa dang po yi //
T02TD3140E:36a-49: cha chung gcig gi mtha' las 'thon //
T02TD3140E:36a-50: rang gi gnyis pa'i rtser song nas //
T02TD3140E:36a-51: bdun pa yis ni dbus su song //
T02TD3140E:36a-52: thig gcig kyog po lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD3140E:36a-53: de nang du yang cha chung phyed //
T02TD3140E:36a-54: dor nas de bzhin gzhan yin no //
T02TD3140E:36a-55: tshangs las rim bzhin rgyal po dang //
T02TD3140E:36a-56: nyi klu chu mig cha chung ni //
T02TD3140E:36a-57: dor bar zlum po'i thig lnga'o //
T02TD3140E:36a-58: dang po gsum gyi nang du yang //
T02TD3140E:36b-0: cha chung phyed @36b phyed dor nas thig //
T02TD3140E:36b-1: zlum po gsum mo rtsibs zlum gyi //
T02TD3140E:36b-2: thig las gzhan ni dbyi bar bya //
T02TD3140E:36b-3: mangs pas 'jigs pas gzhan gyi ni //
T02TD3140E:36b-4: khyad par bsdu ba ma byas so //
T02TD3140E:36b-6: de nas thig gdab pa'i mtha' mchod pa dang gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas //
T02TD3140E:36b-7: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi thig gshegs te /
T02TD3140E:36b-8: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar bcug nas tshon sna lnga'i thig skud gnas ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:36b-11: // / de nas gtor ma byin la /
T02TD3140E:36b-12: bam lam ram ham mam rnams kyi sa bon las byung ba'i dkar po dang ser po dang /
T02TD3140E:36b-13: dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po'i tshon rnams go rims bzhin du zla shel dang /
T02TD3140E:36b-17: aindra n'i la las byung ba rnams sam /
T02TD3140E:36b-20: byi ru rnams dang bsres pa dang /
T02TD3140E:36b-21: mu men las skyes pa rnams te /
T02TD3140E:36b-22: bsres ba ni 'dir mu tig la sogs pa bzhi'o//
T02TD3140E:36b-23: yang na kham pa las byas pa'am /
T02TD3140E:36b-26: ji ltar rigs par so phag gi phye ma'am /
T02TD3140E:36b-27: sol ba dang rus pa'i phye ma la sogs pas kyang rung ste /
T02TD3140E:36b-28: legs par 'du byas pa bzang po rnams /
T02TD3140E:36b-29: bhr'um aam hr'i: kham h'um rnams las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgoms nas /
T02TD3140E:36b-30: nam mkha' la bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar /
T02TD3140E:36b-31: bhr'um la sogs pa las grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshon rnams thig skud 'du bya bar brjod pa'i 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bkug ste bcug pa rnams dang ro gcig tu gyur pas /
T02TD3140E:36b-32: ye shes kyi tshon du grub pa rnams la bh'um la sogs pa mngon par bsngags nas /
T02TD3140E:36b-33: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD3140E:36b-34: zhes pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags so //
T02TD3140E:36b-35: de bzhin du 'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag par gzi byin bskyed cing re re la h'i yig bkod nas bden pa gang gis sems can rnams rdul tshon mang zhing /
T02TD3140E:36b-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la chags pas rjes su chags par 'gyur ba'i bden pa des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:36b-37: lha bsgom pa phul du byung ba las ni 'bar ro //
T02TD3140E:37a-0: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas @37a * //
T02TD3140E:37a-1: snod gsar par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i h'um bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bton nas /
T02TD3140E:37a-3: blos rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la bstims te /
T02TD3140E:37a-4: phur bu'i khung bu tshon lngas bkang la mnyam par byas te /
T02TD3140E:37a-5: dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i glus mtshan ma ngan pa bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-6: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02TD3140E:37a-7: sems can rnams ni rab grol mdzad //
T02TD3140E:37a-8: rang nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD3140E:37a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD3140E:37a-10: nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD3140E:37a-11: 'khor lo'i nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD3140E:37a-12: zhes pas chos dbyings rnam par dag par mos nas /
T02TD3140E:37a-13: dang por nang gi dkyil 'khor du 'dug ste /
T02TD3140E:37a-14: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rjes mtshan zhing g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis /
T02TD3140E:37a-15: aom badzrar ga sa ma ya /
T02TD3140E:37a-17: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD3140E:37a-18: zhes pa brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar du phyogs par 'dug pas dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te g-yas skor du tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-19: phyi nas slob dpon nam ri mo mkhan la sogs pas ji ltar bde bar dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-20: sbom du sgo yi nyi shu char //
T02TD3140E:37a-21: re kh'a yang dag drang bar bya //
T02TD3140E:37a-22: mnyam nyid drang la mchad pa //
T02TD3140E:37a-23: ji ltar rigs par phan tshun gyi //
T02TD3140E:37a-24: bar gyi tshad ni nas tsam ste ;
T02TD3140E:37a-25: /'og dang steng ni ci mdzes bya //
T02TD3140E:37a-26: sbom por bkye na nad 'byung ngo //
T02TD3140E:37a-27: phra mo yis ni nor rnams nyams //
T02TD3140E:37a-28: yon pa yis ni rnam par sdang //
T02TD3140E:37a-29: chad na bla ma slob ma 'chi //
T02TD3140E:37a-30: g-yas skor min par bkye na ni //
T02TD3140E:37a-31: tshon rnams phur pas btab par 'gyur //
T02TD3140E:37a-32: phur pas btab pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu yang ma yin pa'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-33: phan tshun 'dres na rigs chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD3140E:37a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02TD3140E:37a-35: tshon bkye ba la nyes pa gang //
T02TD3140E:37a-36: de nyid bsam sbyor med la'o //
T02TD3140E:37a-37: de nyid bsam bzang sbyor rnams la //
T02TD3140E:37a-38: sus kyang bar chad bya mi nus //
T02TD3140E:37a-39: dkyil 'khor rdzi lta ba de bzhin //
T02TD3140E:37a-40: ji srid du ni brtags pa yin //
T02TD3140E:37a-42: tshon gyi re kh'a rnams la yang rin chen dkar po la sogs pa las byas pa'i thur ma la sogs pa'i ngo bor mos par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-0: rdo rje shugs kyi ye shes kyis @37b tshon gyi re kh'a yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg la /
T02TD3140E:37b-1: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um zhes brjod cing rtsa ba'i thig gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3140E:37b-2: de la dang por lha thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i tshon gyi kha dog gi rim pa brjod par bya'o//
T02TD3140E:37b-3: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD3140E:37b-4: dbus kyi gtso bo'i kha dog gi go rims bzhin du phyi'i re kh'a nas brtsams te /
T02TD3140E:37b-5: nang gi re kh'a'i bar du tshon lnga'i rtsig pa'i re kh'a'i kha dog go //
T02TD3140E:37b-6: phyogs dang dbus su lha gzhan dgod pa ni rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog gi rim pas so //
T02TD3140E:37b-7: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga po 'di dag rin po che kha dog lnga las grub cing nas kyi bar tsam pa'o zhes pa ni kha cig go //
T02TD3140E:37b-8: rtsig pa 'di ni gcig pa nyid kyis rim gyis steng nas steng du kha dog lnga'i rin po che las byas pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02TD3140E:37b-9: de la 'dod pa dang po la ni rin po che'i snam bu'i sa dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:37b-10: do shal dang do shal phyed pa'i sa nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-11: 'dod pa gnyis pa la ni dang po'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid rnam par bkra ba'i rin po che'i snam bu'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-12: yang na de la kha dog gzhan gyi rin po che las byas pa bkod pa'i rin po che'i snam bu'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-13: lnga pa'i kha dog gi rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi cha nyid dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa sna tshogs pa'i snam bu'am /
T02TD3140E:37b-14: yang na de la mdog gzhan gyi rin po che las byas pa bkod pa'i dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa snam bu'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-15: phyogs gzhan brjod pa ni de'i steng du rin po che'i snam bu dra ba'i snam bu lta bu'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-16: 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang stegs bu ni shel lam gser gyi rang bzhin nam padma ga'i rang bzhin nam //
T02TD3140E:37b-17: rin po che gzhan yang rung ste ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-18: rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab rnams ni dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:37b-19: rin po che'i shar bu dang mda' yab dang /
T02TD3140E:37b-20: dar dpyangs kyi bar gyis gzhi ni sngon po ste /
T02TD3140E:37b-21: nam mkha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3140E:37b-22: de nyid kyi phyir bar gyi snam bu la mun pa'i snam bu zhes brjod do //
T02TD3140E:37b-23: gdung ni ji ltar mdzes par rin po che las byas pa ste /
T02TD3140E:37b-24: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i pa tra 'phro ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-0: rta babs kyi kab rnams ni rang @38a * //
T02TD3140E:38a-1: rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3140E:38a-2: kyog po'i nang gi bla res kyi 'og gis yang ste /
T02TD3140E:38a-3: de ni rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog gi 'od kyis sbras pa'i nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:38a-6: chu srin gyi snam bu ni kha dog ji ltar mdzes par ro ;
T02TD3140E:38a-7: /'khor lo rnams ni gser gyi kha dog go //
T02TD3140E:38a-8: kha cig rin po che gzhan las kyang byas pa'o zhes so //
T02TD3140E:38a-9: ri dags dang ri dags mo ni gser gyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD3140E:38a-10: rin po che gzhan gyis sbras pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-11: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba ni nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-12: kha cig tu gtso bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3140E:38a-13: dbus kyi ra rnams ni rang rang gi phyogs rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3140E:38a-14: de las gzhan pa rnams ni de'i glo dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3140E:38a-15: ra lnga ba la ni de las gzhan pa'i phyogs dang dbus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog ste ji ltar rigs par ro //
T02TD3140E:38a-16: phyogs gcig gi thams cad kyang rang rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog kyang kha cig tu'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-17: 'khor lo'i dbang po'i zhal bzhi pa nyid la rang rang gi phyogs kyi zhal gyi mdog go zhes pa ni phyogs gzhan no //
T02TD3140E:38a-18: bum pa bzang po rnams ni gser las byas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-19: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams ni de las gzhan ba'i shing bzang po lta bu'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-20: padma'i lte ba ni ljang gu'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-22: 'dab ma rnams ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-23: de'i sa gzhi ni dmar pos shas che ba'i dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-24: chos 'byung gi cha'i re kh'a ni dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-25: khor yug gi phyogs la yang shel nyid yin na re kh'a dkar po'am gser nyid yin na ni ser po'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-26: rdo rje rnams dang de'i re kh'a nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:38a-27: gzhan rnams ni dkar po'am ser po'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:38a-28: rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i mdog ni ji ltar mdzes pa ste /
T02TD3140E:38a-29: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas steng du 'og min gyi mtha'i bar du rdo rje'i 'di ba gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD3140E:38a-30: rlung la sogs pa rnams ni ji ltar rigs par kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3140E:38a-31: 'od zer rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog ste 'phro ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD3140E:38a-33: rdzogs sangs ye shes sku yin phyir //
T02TD3140E:38a-34: ngag dbang rdo rje'i rigs su brjod /
T02TD3140E:38b-0: chos sku'i @38b rang bzhin dag pa la //
T02TD3140E:38b-3: dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar //
T02TD3140E:38b-4: ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid //
T02TD3140E:38b-5: rtsig pa'i tshon zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:38b-7: chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ni dkar //
T02TD3140E:38b-8: des na ngag dbang 'dir dkar nyid //
T02TD3140E:38b-10: gsung rdo rje dkar po gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe ni tshon gyi re kh'a dkar po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-11: kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po nyid yin yang mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3140E:38b-12: lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD3140E:38b-13: nang gi rtsig pa nag po nyid do //
T02TD3140E:38b-14: gzhan du ni dkar po kho na yin te /
T02TD3140E:38b-16: gsung rdo rje gtso bor gyur pa kha cig tu dkar po nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:38b-17: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang gi dkyil 'khor du yang zur thig gnyis gnyis kyis bcad pa'i phyogs bzhi'i sa gzhi rnams rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go //
T02TD3140E:38b-18: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i thig rnams de bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:38b-19: ka ba rnams kyang de bzhin te /
T02TD3140E:38b-20: rang rang gi re'u mig gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-21: gtso bo'i sa ni gtso bo'i mdog go //
T02TD3140E:38b-23: bden bral ljang la dbang ldan nag //
T02TD3140E:38b-24: me dang rlung gi mtshams ni ser //
T02TD3140E:38b-25: phyogs rnams kyi ni dmar po'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-26: gtso bo'i snam bu la ni gtso bo'i mtshan ma'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-27: re kh'a gzhan ni mdog dang sbom phra ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-28: bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni thugs kyi 'khor lo nag po /
T02TD3140E:38b-29: de'i rtsibs kyi bar rnams ni dmar po ste /
T02TD3140E:38b-30: gsung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3140E:38b-32: de'i rtsibs bar rnams ni dkar po ste /
T02TD3140E:38b-33: sku'i 'khor lo'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3140E:38b-35: de'i rtsibs rnams kyi bar ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog go //
T02TD3140E:38b-36: mu khyud gsum ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje nag po dang /
T02TD3140E:38b-38: 'khor lo dkar po'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD3140E:38b-39: phyi ngos nas brtsams te nang gi bar du ljang gu dang /
T02TD3140E:38b-43: nag po'i kha dog gi re kh'a lnga'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-5: thog rnams kyi kha dog dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:39a-10: gzhan ni re kh'a lnga dang /
T02TD3140E:39a-16: dkar po dang bsres pa'i sngon po'i mdog go zhes zer ro //
T02TD3140E:39a-17: de bzhin du snga ma dang /
T02TD3140E:39a-18: phyi mar kha dog gi rim pa yongs su bsams nas rdul tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-19: de yang skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus na mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ji ltar rigs par bri'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-20: skal ba dang mi ldan pa med na ni lha'i sku bri bar bya zhing ;
T02TD3140E:39a-24: legs par 'dus byas ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-25: de ltar klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis /
T02TD3140E:39a-26: ji ltar nus pas dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD3140E:39a-27: sa bon dgod bya yang na ni //
T02TD3140E:39a-28: mtshan ma'am lha yi gzugs nyid de //
T02TD3140E:39a-29: lugs ma'am bzo byas dgod par bya ;
T02TD3140E:39a-31: phyag rgya bri ba ni mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsungs te /
T02TD3140E:39a-32: mi nus na ni bris pa yi //
T02TD3140E:39a-33: phyag rgya'am mtshan ma dgod par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-35: tshon nam yang na bir rnams kyis //
T02TD3140E:39a-36: bris pa rnams kyis rnam par sbras //
T02TD3140E:39a-38: dpal kha sbyor gyi rgyud du yang /
T02TD3140E:39a-40: 'dus byas pa la sogs pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD3140E:39a-41: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:39a-42: de'i phyir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD3140E:39a-43: lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i zla ba ral gri sngo bsangs so //
T02TD3140E:39a-44: shar du zla ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-45: lhor nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-46: nub tu nyi ma la mgon po 'od dpag med kyi padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-47: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gyi ljang gu'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-48: mer zla ba la spyan ma'i mig 'bras nag po can gyi mig dkar po gnyis sprin la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-49: bden bral du zla ba la m'a ma k'i'i rdo rje nag po rtse lnga pa ste rgyud du de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD3140E:39a-50: rlung du zla ba la gos dkar mo'i padma dmar po kha bye ba yu ba dang rtsa ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39a-51: dbang ldan du zla ba la sgrol ma'i autpala mdog sngo ser ro //
T02TD3140E:39b-0: @39b me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-1: shar sgo'i g-yon dang g-yas su cha chung gnyis gnyis spangs pa'i 'gram dag tu zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du gzugs dang sgra dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi me long dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-6: dri za'i bi wang sngon po dang dri ser po'i dung dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar bye ba dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-12: padma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed kyi go rims bzhin du rdo rje thob nag po dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-13: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-15: rdo rje kha gyes pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-16: 'dir zla ba dang nyi ma bcu dgu ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-17: mtshan ma thams cad ni 'od zer dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-18: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ni mgo nub tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-19: de ltar phyi ma rnams su yang ngo //
T02TD3140E:39b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nyid la ni dbus su chu skyes dang zla ba la ni zhi ba'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-21: kha cig ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o zhes so //
T02TD3140E:39b-22: mkhas pa rnams ni dbus kyi 'od zer gyi thig zlum po la tshon gyis re kh'a mi bya'o zhes so //
T02TD3140E:39b-23: zlum po'i thig gi phyi ngos su tshangs pa'i thig gi glo so sor cha chung bzhi dor nas bum pa cha chung bzhi pa ste /
T02TD3140E:39b-24: bdud rtsis bkang pa'i gsar gyi bum pa cha brgyad do zhes phyogs gcig go //
T02TD3140E:39b-25: gzhan ni rin po che'i rang bzhin rang gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdog go zhes so //
T02TD3140E:39b-26: 'di dang phyi ma rnams la dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan pa'i mtshan ma dgod pa ni /
T02TD3140E:39b-27: de'i dbus su dbus kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:39b-28: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD3140E:39b-29: dbus su nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje kha gyes pa rtse lnga pa aindra n'i la lta bu dang /
T02TD3140E:39b-30: reg bya rdo rje ma'i sna tshogs pa'i gos so //
T02TD3140E:39b-31: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rim pa dang po dang gnyis par gnas pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:39b-32: rim pa gsum pa'i sgo'i 'gram gyi snam bu la tshangs pa'i thig nas cha chung bzhi dor bar g-yon du byams pa'i klu shing gi me tog gi 'khor lo dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-0: @40a * // g-yas su sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-1: lhor de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-2: nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-3: rin po che ma ga ta cha dgu pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-4: nub tu de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-5: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi padma dmar po dang rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-6: byang du de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-7: kun du bzang po'i ral gri dang rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-8: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rim ba bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje thob dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-9: rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-12: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su go rims bzhin du mi g-yo ba dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-15: stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-16: rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-17: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-18: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:40a-19: gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma la sogs phyi ngos su'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-20: kha cig ni 'khor lo ser po zhes bya'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-21: gnod mdzes rgyal po'i rdo rje ni padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-22: byams ba la sogs pa brgyad rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-23: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bcu ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-24: 'dir nyi ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa gcig ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-25: bum pa bri ba ni sngar bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:40a-26: kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su zla ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-27: shar du zla ba la rnam bar snang mdzad kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-28: lhor nyi ma la rin chen dbang bo'i rin chen no //
T02TD3140E:40a-29: nub tu nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi mda'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-30: byang du nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-31: spyan ma'i sprin la gnas pa'i mig nyid do //
T02TD3140E:40a-35: rim pa gnyis par shar du drag mo'i mda'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-36: lhor rdo rje gzugs ma'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-37: nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i ral gri'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-38: byang du rdo rje zhib mo'i til pa thung du'o //
T02TD3140E:40a-39: dpal ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i dbyug ba dkar ser ro //
T02TD3140E:40a-40: mer mkha' 'gro ma'i padma dmar ser ro //
T02TD3140E:40b-0: bden bral du sgra rdo je ma'i @40b sha kti'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-1: rlung dus rdo rje ma'i bum pa dkar ljang ngo //
T02TD3140E:40b-2: rim pa gsum par shar gyi phyogs su bzhad ma'i rdo rje kha dog dmar po'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-5: byang du gar ma'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa ljang gu'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-6: dbang ldan du gling dbu ma'i gling bu'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-7: mer bi wang ma'i pi wang //
T02TD3140E:40b-8: bden bral du mu kunda ma'i mu kunda'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-9: rlung du rdza rnga ma'i rdza rnga'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-10: phyi'i snam bu'i mer me tog ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-11: bden bral du bdug spos ma'i spos phor ro //
T02TD3140E:40b-12: rlung du mar me ma'i mar me'i mchod sdong ngo //
T02TD3140E:40b-13: dbang ldan du dri ma'i dri'i dung chos so //
T02TD3140E:40b-14: shar du me long ma'i me long ngo ;
T02TD3140E:40b-15: / lhor ro ma'i ro'i snod do //
T02TD3140E:40b-16: nub du reg bya ma'i gos sna tshogs so //
T02TD3140E:40b-17: byang du chos ma'i chos 'byung dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-18: shar la sogs pa'i sgor ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-19: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-20: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-21: rdo rje dril bum rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-23: rdo rje phreng pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-24: rdo rje dril bum rnams te nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-25: 'dir brjod pa'i nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i mtshan ma bdun las mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-26: nya ma dang zla ba sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma'i steng du thod ba rnams la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:40b-27: bum pa bri ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD3140E:40b-28: thig zlum po drug pa las phyi rol zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3140E:40b-29: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-32: lho rnams su go rims bzhin du ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-34: mkha' 'gro ma mi zad ma dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-36: gtum mo rnams kyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am ga rnams so //
T02TD3140E:40b-38: me dang dben bral dang rlung rnams su seng ge mo dang stag mo dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-39: ce spyang mo dang 'ug ba mo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu rnams so //
T02TD3140E:40b-40: shar dang byang dang nub dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-41: lho'i sgo rnams su rgyal po'i dbang mo dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-44: kam po dz'i rnams kyi go rims bzhin du lag pa gnyis stim pa kha bye ba dang /
T02TD3140E:40b-46: snyim pa khrag gis bkang ba dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-0: rdo rje thal mo kha sbyar ba'i mthe bo'i rtse mo gnyis sbyar ba'i mdzub mo @41a * //
T02TD3140E:41a-2: 'dir mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-3: bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs padma ni rim pa bzhin du /
T02TD3140E:41a-4: seng ge dang mche ba can dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-5: rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-7: sprul gyi dbang po brgyad kyi mjug ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-8: ro bzhi la gnas pa ste /
T02TD3140E:41a-9: de ltar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la ni skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'dus pa na bri bar mi bya'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-10: gzhan du ni ngal bas 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-11: yon bdag bsdus pa la dga' bas so //
T02TD3140E:41a-12: skal ba dang ldan pa rab tu dang bar bya ba'i don du ni yon bdag gi dbang las bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-13: de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang ji ltar 'byung ba bri ba dang mi bri bar rig par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-14: phyi ngos kyi thig zlum po'i phyi ngos su bum pa bri'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-15: bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-16: shar dang lho la sogs pa dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-17: dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la ni rim pa bzhin du rdo rje drag mo dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-20: rdo rje zhi ba mo dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-24: sa rdo rje ma rnams kyi mda' dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-25: rdo rje dang ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-31: rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa rnams su gling bum dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-34: rdza rnga ma rnams kyi gling bu dang ;
T02TD3140E:41a-36: rnga mu kunda dang rdza rnga rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41a-37: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-38: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-39: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-40: rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:41a-43: rdo rje dril bu rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41a-44: mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams ni thod pa dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-45: gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi ni thod pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma'o //
T02TD3140E:41a-46: phyag gnyis pa dang bzhi ba la ni thod pa med do //
T02TD3140E:41a-47: phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la khro bo'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-0: @41b dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la goo r'i dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-7: rab tu rmongs byed ma rnams kyi rim ba bzhin du mda' dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-9: thod pa khrag dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i rus sbal dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-10: tshil gyis bkang ba la gnas pa'i sbrul dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-11: shas bkang ba la gnas pa'i seng ge dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-12: khu ba dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-13: khrag dang bcas pa'i thod pa la gnas pa'i stag dang chang gi snod rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41b-14: rim pa gnyis pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:41b-15: shar la sogs pa'i sgor stag gdong ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-18: seng ge'i gdong ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-22: mtshan ma bcu bdun po 'di rnams nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-23: gling bu ma la sogs pa brgyad kyi nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41b-24: dbus kyi 'od zer gyi phyi ngos su sngar bzhin du bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41b-25: bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte ba dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-26: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims bzhin du bdag med ma dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-30: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-31: rim pa gnyis par phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod pa'i dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-32: gling bu ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-33: rta gdong ma la sogs pa'i gri gug rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41b-34: mkha' spyod ma'i rdo rje ni rta gdong ma'i phyi ngos su'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-35: sa spyod ma'i rdo rje ni khyi gdong ma'i phyi ngos su'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-36: 'dir gri gug bzhi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-37: mtshan ma gzhan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-38: phyi'i dkar mo la sogs pa bco brgyad po rnams kyi zla ba dang /
T02TD3140E:41b-39: nyi ma ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-40: gling bum la sogs pa brgyad med pa ni lhag ma lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyi zla ba la gri gug rnams so //
T02TD3140E:41b-41: mkha' spyod ma'i mtshan ma ni dkar mo'i phyi ngos so //
T02TD3140E:41b-42: ro langs ma'i phyi ngos su sa spyod ma'o //
T02TD3140E:41b-43: de bzhin du ku ru ku lle'i dkyil 'khor la yang yin te /
T02TD3140E:42a-0: khyad par ni zla ba la yu ba dang bcas pa'i autpa @42a * //
T02TD3140E:42a-1: la dmar po kha 'bus pa'i mda' yod pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-2: 'dir lha mo bco lnga po rnams kyang ku ru kulle'i bzhin du mdog dmar po'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-3: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang po la sna tshogs padma'i lte ba dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-4: shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-11: yid tshim byed pa rnams kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-12: khyad par ni zla tshes ma'i zla ba cha gcig pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-13: rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su me tog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-16: dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi za ma tog dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-20: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams su gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gling bu la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-21: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su khro gnyer rim par ldan dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-24: tshogs kyi gtso bo rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-28: mtshan ma nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams ni zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-29: me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi zla ba'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-30: yang na dkyil 'khor pa thams cad la chos 'byung bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-31: 'di nyid kho na bri bar bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag go //
T02TD3140E:42a-32: gzhan rdo rje bdud rtsi gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du rig par bya'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-33: dgu'i bdag nyid can kye'i rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte bar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po kha gyes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-34: shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du dkar mo dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-41: g-yung mo rnams kyi gri gug dang /
T02TD3140E:42a-49: phyag bcu drug pa'i nyi ma la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42a-50: thod pa dkar po zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD3140E:42a-51: phyi ngos kyi zlum po las phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:42b-0: sgyu ma chen mo'i dkyil 'khor la padma @42b dmar po'i lte bar nyi ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen po'i padma'i snod do //
T02TD3140E:42b-1: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la g-yas skor du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-4: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-5: rin po che'i snye ma dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-8: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud nas gnas pas de'i mtshan ma tha dad du mi dgod do //
T02TD3140E:42b-9: dgu'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar nyi ma la cang te'u'o //
T02TD3140E:42b-10: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang dbang ldan dang me dang bden bral dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-11: rlung gi 'dab mar nyi ma rnams la sna tshogs sde ma dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-18: nam mkha' la gnas ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so //
T02TD3140E:42b-19: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la dbus su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:42b-20: shar la sogs par g-yon skor du rdo rje dbyug pa dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-24: me la sogs par g-yas skor du rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-29: rdo rje sa 'og rnams kyi rdo rje tho ba dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-38: rdo rje'i gtun shing rnams te /
T02TD3140E:42b-39: mtshan ma thams cad ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:42b-40: yang na shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g-yas skor du gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-43: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi rdo rje'i tho ba dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-44: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-47: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mi g-yo ba dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-50: stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-52: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:42b-53: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:42b-54: gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gtsug tor 'khor lo tsan gyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-0: @43a * // padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma las phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-1: mtshan ma bcu gcig po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-2: yang na bgegs dgra'i rdo rje kha gyes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-3: me la sogs pa rnams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-6: mi g-yo ba rnams kyi lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-7: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-10: gtsug tor 'khor lo can gyi 'khor lo ser po chen po'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-11: gzhan rnams kyi bshad ma thag pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:43a-12: yang na gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-15: rdo rje dril bu rnams te //
T02TD3140E:43a-16: gzhan rnams kyi bshad ma thag ba snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:43a-17: bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar gnas pa'i nyi ma la dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po kha gyes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-18: phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-21: gzugs can ma rnams kyi gri gug rnams so //
T02TD3140E:43a-22: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la padma'i snod rnams so //
T02TD3140E:43a-23: thugs kyi 'khor lo la sogs ba'i rtsibs nyi shu rtsa bzhi la rab tu gtum mo dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-27: dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-29: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-33: rlung gi shugs can ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-35: lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-46: brtson 'grus chen mo rnams kyi gri gug go //
T02TD3140E:43a-47: gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir dpa' bo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bri'o //
T02TD3140E:43a-48: sgo rnams su khva gdong ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-52: mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-53: gshin rje pho nya mo dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-55: gshin rje 'joms ma rnams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:43a-56: nyi ma rnams la gri gug go //
T02TD3140E:43b-0: 'dir shar la sogs pa'i @43b phyogs su g-yon skor du dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-1: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su g-yas skor du mtshan ma dgod do //
T02TD3140E:43b-2: phyi ngos su zlum po'i thig las phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi char bum pa rnams bri'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-3: de las gzhan pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-4: rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng bar brjod do //
T02TD3140E:43b-5: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes la nyi mar cang te'u'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-6: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams kyi gri gug rnams te shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g-yon skor dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-7: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su g-yas skor ro ;
T02TD3140E:43b-8: / de la 'khor lo nag po'i rtsibs kyi steng du phyogs kyi 'dab ma la legs phreng can ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-12: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:43b-13: de nas rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-14: rim pa gnyis pa la rtsibs brgyad dmar po la gnas pa'i chu skyes brgyad rnams la phyogs rnams su dge pa'i ske rags ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-18: mtshams rnams su dus can ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-22: de nas rdo rje phreng ba dmar po'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-23: rim pa gsum bar rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i padma 'dab brgyad la phyogs su sgrol ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-25: legs mthong ma dang thub dka' ma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-26: mtshams rnams su dge ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-30: de nas rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-31: sgo'i padma rnams la mdzes ma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-34: mthong ba yid 'ong ma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-35: padma nyi shu'i steng du nyi ma rnams la gri gug rnams so zhes gdams so //
T02TD3140E:43b-36: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD3140E:43b-37: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD3140E:43b-38: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i re'u mig rnams la padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i kha tv'am ga rnams so //
T02TD3140E:43b-39: dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i re'u mig rnams la kha tv'am ga dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-0: shar la sogs pa'i re'u mig @44a * //
T02TD3140E:44a-1: rnams la kha tv'am ga rnams kyi phyi ngos su rim pa bzhin du khar bsdus pa'i lag pa gnyis dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-2: snyim pa sbyar ba dang khrag gi snyim pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-4: kha tv'am ga la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams padma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-5: 'od zer gyi khor yug gi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su bdud rtsi'i thod pa gsum mo //
T02TD3140E:44a-6: byang du sgron ma'i thod pa gsum dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-7: nub du gtor ma'i thod pa gsum dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-8: lhor btung ba'i thod pa gsum dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-9: dbang ldan du snyems pa'i lag pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-12: me tog gi za ma tog go //
T02TD3140E:44a-13: bden bral du sdigs mdzub kyi lag pa dang spos snod do ;
T02TD3140E:44a-14: / rlung du thal mo dang mar me'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-15: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la so sor bzhi bzhi dang sgo dang mtshams su brgyad de kha tv'am ga nyer bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-16: bdud rtsi'i thod pa la sogs pa ni mtsho skyes ma nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-17: gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-18: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i ra'i rtsa ba rnams su rtag pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-21: don yod grub pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-22: rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-23: padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-24: ral gri ljang gu rnams so //
T02TD3140E:44a-25: sna tshogs rdo rje'i me dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-26: bden bral la sogs pa'i grvar rdo rje tsa rtsi ka dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-28: rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-29: dkar mo rnams kyi 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang padma dang ral gri'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-30: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'o ;
T02TD3140E:44a-31: / de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyogs so sor ra lnga'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-32: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su thob gshin rje gshed dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-33: dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-35: ral gri gshin rje gshed rnams kyi rdo rje rtse mo nyi shu pas mtshan pa'i tho ba dang /
T02TD3140E:44a-40: lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma ni zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-41: gzan gyi ni nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-42: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'og tu ni sna tshogs padma'o //
T02TD3140E:44a-43: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su padma la gnas pa'i thod pa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-0: ra'i glo rnams su bum pa @44b rnams so ;
T02TD3140E:44b-1: / rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte bar zla ba la rdo rje rtse dgu pa gser gyi mdog can no //
T02TD3140E:44b-2: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i 'dab mar zla ba rnams la me tog sgrol ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-5: dri'i sgrol ma rnams kyi me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-9: me la sogs pa'i 'dab mar rtag pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-12: don yod grub pa'i rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-16: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags gyu ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-17: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-18: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-19: rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi lcags kyu la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD3140E:44b-20: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-21: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyi ngos su gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-22: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i phyi ngos su rdo rje gnod mdzes ma'i sbrul gyi zhags pa ste /
T02TD3140E:44b-23: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-24: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su padma la spyan ma dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-26: gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams kyi rnams par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-27: ri ra dang me thab dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-28: padma'i phyi ngos su bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:44b-29: 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi sna tshogs padmar nyi ma'am /
T02TD3140E:44b-30: zla ba mda' ste mtshan mo zla ba la gnas shing nyin mo nyi ma la gnas te lha mo rnams par rgyu'o //
T02TD3140E:44b-31: shar dang lho la sogs pa'i phyogs su aarka ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-33: aanda ra dha na ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-34: te dzo ma s'i'i lha mo rnams kyi go rims bzhin du khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-35: aa shva ka'i yal ga dang mda' rnams so //
T02TD3140E:44b-36: me dang srin po la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su au da ya ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-39: tsa'i ba ra ma s'i rnams kyi mtshan ma ni go rims bzhin du aarka ma s'i la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:44b-40: phyi'i pho brang gi snam bu'i shar du ma h'a tsi ba ra ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-41: ba ra ha mu kha'i lha mo dag gi rdo rje dang lcags kyu gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:44b-42: lho phyogs su lha mo pa d'a kra ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:44b-43: ba ra l'i dag gi aa sho ka'i 'dab ma gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:44b-44: nub tu lha mo pa ra kra ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-0: ba da l'i dag gi mda' @45a * //
T02TD3140E:45a-2: / byang du lha mo aurma ma s'i dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-3: ba r'a l'i dag gi khab gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:45a-4: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su batt'a l'i dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-7: ba r'a ha mu khi rnams kyi khab dang skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang aa sho ka'i lo ma dang mda' rnams so //
T02TD3140E:45a-8: shar sgor lha mo aa lo'i rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-9: lhor lha mo ta lo'i rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-10: nub du lha mo ka lo'i rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02TD3140E:45a-11: byang du lha mo satstsha lo sam ba m'u rdhi t'i'i rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-12: 'dir sgo skyong a'i mtshan ma rnams ni padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-13: gzhan dag gi ni padma dang zla ba'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-14: srung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor la dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rin po che'i chun po'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-15: shar du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-16: lhor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-17: nub tu sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i padma'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-18: byang du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la rma bya chen mo'i rma bya'i mjug sgro'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-19: rim pa gnyis par me la sogs pa'i mtshams su nag mo dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-22: dkar mo rnams kyi dung dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-23: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-26: snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:45a-27: shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-28: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sna tshogs padma'i lte bar zla ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-29: lte ba'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin du g-yas skor du sems ma rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-30: rin chen rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-31: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-32: las kyi rdo rje rnams kyi rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-33: rdo rje rtsa lnga'i rtse mo can gyi rin po che dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-34: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i padm'a dab brgyad dkar dmar dang /
T02TD3140E:45a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog gi sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:45a-36: shar la sogs pa'i padma'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la go rims bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-0: don yod grub pa rams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon @45b po dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-1: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-4: mi bskyod pa'i padma'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-7: rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-11: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi padma la rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-14: rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-16: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-17: so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o ;
T02TD3140E:45b-18: / snang ba mtha' yas kyi rdo rje chos dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-21: rdo rje srung ba rnams kyi padma dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-24: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o //
T02TD3140E:45b-25: don yod grub pa'i rdo rje las dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-28: rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-30: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-32: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa so so'i byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa'i mtshan ma ni byang gi 'dab mar dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-33: bzhi pa'i mtshan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:45b-34: me la sogs pa'i padma'i lte ba'i zla ba rnams la rdo rje sgeg mo dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-35: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-37: rdo rje gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-38: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-41: dbus kyi gzhal yas khang las phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar du byams pa dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-44: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams kyi padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:45b-45: lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-48: ye shes tog rnams kyi padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin po che rnams so //
T02TD3140E:45b-52: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-53: zla ba rnams la rdo rje padma rnams so //
T02TD3140E:45b-54: byang du rdo rje snying po dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-55: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02TD3140E:45b-57: kun du bzang po rnams kyi padma dang zla ba rnams la sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3140E:46a-1: la sogs pa'i grva rnams su padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje bdug spos ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-2: rdo rje me tog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-3: rdo rje mar me ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-4: rdo rje dri chab ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:46a-5: shar la sogs pa'i sgor padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-8: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
T02TD3140E:46a-9: snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:46a-10: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsig pa lnga ni sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-15: shar la sogs ba'i phyogs dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-16: dbus kyis thams cad kyang ngo //
T02TD3140E:46a-17: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la rtsig pa gsum ste /
T02TD3140E:46a-21: 'khor lo gsum pa la rtsig ba dkar po gcig go //
T02TD3140E:46a-22: de la dbus kyi sa gzhi ser bo la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la 'jam dpal gyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no ;
T02TD3140E:46a-23: / shar la sogs pa'i re mig gi nyi ma la mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-26: don yod grub pa rnams rdo rje sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-30: dbang ldan la sogs ba'i re'u mig gi zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-33: sgrol ma rnams kyi rdo rje ser bo dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-37: rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zla ba rnams la sems ma rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-38: rin chen rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-39: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-40: las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:46a-41: dbang ldan la sogs ba'i mtshams su zla ba rnams la tsunda dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-44: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-45: rin po che ser po dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-47: rdo rje lcags sgrog ljang gu rnams so//
T02TD3140E:46a-48: rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la shar gyi zla ba rnams la byams pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-51: ye shes tog rnams kyi klu shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-53: lag ldan gyi snam bu la gnas pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46a-54: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-0: lho'i zla ba @46b rnams la bzang skyong dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-3: spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams kyi mda' dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-4: dkar po dang ser po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-6: nub kyi zla ba rnams la mthu chen thob pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-8: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-9: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams kyi padma dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-12: autpala dmar po la gnas pa'i nyi ma'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-13: byang phyogs kyi zla ba rnams la zla 'od dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-16: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi autpala la gnas pa'i zla ba dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-20: 'dir go rims bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su logs gnyis kyi snam bu la mtshan ma gnyis gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:46b-21: shar la sogs pa'i sgor nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-22: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-24: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnams kyi ral gri yu ba nag po can dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-26: rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-27: ral gri yu ba sngon po can dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-28: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi nyi ma rnams la mi g-yo ba dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-31: stobs po che rnams kyi ral gri sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-33: rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po dang /
T02TD3140E:46b-34: rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-35: gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi rol du nyi ma la gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-36: rta mgrin gyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la rdo rjes 'og gi rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-37: zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyi 'og tu sna tshogs chu skyes so //
T02TD3140E:46b-38: snam bu rnams la bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:46b-39: kha cig tu ni gshin rje gshed kyi mtshan ma'i phyi ngos su nyi ma la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang de'i phyi ngos su gnod mdzes kyi ral gri'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD3140E:46b-40: chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la nang gi 'khor lo tshon dkar pos dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:46b-41: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD3140E:46b-42: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs padma'i lte bar zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ral gri yu ba ser po can no //
T02TD3140E:47a-0: shar la sogs pa dang dbang ldan @47a * //
T02TD3140E:47a-1: la sogs pa'i 'dab ma'i zla ba rnams la go rims bzhin g-yas skor du gtsug tor chen po dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-8: rgyal ba ste gtsug tor brgyad po rnams kyi 'khor lo ser po rnams so //
T02TD3140E:47a-9: shar gyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:47a-10: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-13: rdo rje legs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-16: lho'i re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-17: nyi mal rin chen 'byung ldan gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu ser po'i rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD3140E:47a-18: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-19: zla ba rnams la rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-22: rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-24: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-25: so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:47a-26: nub kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs padmar nyi ma la snang ba mtha' yas kyi padma dmar po'o //
T02TD3140E:47a-27: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje chos dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-29: rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje srung ba rnams kyi padma dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-32: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'o //
T02TD3140E:47a-33: byang phyogs kyi re mig gi dbus su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la don yod grub pa'i ral gri'o //
T02TD3140E:47a-34: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje las dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-36: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-38: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang ;
T02TD3140E:47a-40: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re mig gi padma dang zla ba rnams la spyan ma dang /
T02TD3140E:47a-43: sgrol ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-0: don yod grub pa'i mtshan ma @47b bzhin no ;
T02TD3140E:47b-1: / shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-4: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3140E:47b-5: nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar phyogs su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams las bcu gnyis so //
T02TD3140E:47b-17: kun du 'od kyi sa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du g-yas skor du padma dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-18: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-20: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-23: padma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-24: sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje yu ba dang bcas pa'i padma dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-25: zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-26: autpala'i steng du ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-27: chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-28: padma la bzhugs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
T02TD3140E:47b-29: lhor sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la rin chen padma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-39: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-40: rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis rnams kyi padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'bru sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i snye ma dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-41: lo ma dang bcas pa'i aa sho ka'i me tog gi chun po dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-45: padma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-46: chu skyes ser bo la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-47: autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-48: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-49: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-50: autpala la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:47b-51: nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:47b-52: zla ba rnams la tshe dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-8: chos la dbang ba rnams dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-10: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
T02TD3140E:48a-11: dbang bcu gnyis rnams kyi nor bu padma r'a ga la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i tshe dpag med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-12: rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-13: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-15: me tog dz'a ti kha dog sna tshogs pa'i yal 'dab dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-16: padma la gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-17: pri yang ku'i me tog gi snye ma dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-19: autpala la gnas pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-20: padma ma gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-22: chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD3140E:48a-23: byang phyogs su sna tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la dbyig gi blo gros ma dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-24: rin po che'i skar mda' dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-25: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-27: ri khrod lo ma can dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-32: las dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-33: ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-34: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod ldan ma rnams te /
T02TD3140E:48a-35: gzungs bcu gnyis rnams kyi 'bras kyi snye ma dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-36: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-37: nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-38: skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-40: dug gi me tog gi chun po dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-41: padma dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-42: ril pa spyi blugs la phreng ba dpyangs pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-43: autpala sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-44: rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i padma dkar dmar dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-45: rin po che'i za ma tog dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-46: padma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dpe sgro ma mo //
T02TD3140E:48a-47: shar la sogs pa'i sgor chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-48: nyi ma rnams la chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-49: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-50: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:48a-51: rin po che'i zhags pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-0: mtha' gnyis su padmas @48b mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-1: rdo rje rtse gsum bas mtshan pa'i dril bu'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-2: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su sgeg mo dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-5: gar ma rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-6: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-9: dkyil 'khor gsum par padma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su kun du bzang po'i autpala la la gnas pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-10: blo gros mi zad pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-11: sa'i snying po'i padma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-12: nam mkha'i snying po'i rin po che'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-13: lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-14: phyag na rin chen gyi rin po che dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-15: blo gros rgya mtsho'i dung dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-16: rdo rje snying po'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-17: nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi padma dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-18: mthu chen thob kyi ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-19: zla 'od kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-20: dra ba can gyi 'od kyi ral gri'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-21: byang du padma dang zla ba rnams la 'od dpag med dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-23: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-24: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams kyi sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-25: padma la gnas pa'i gral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-26: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-28: shar la sogs pa'i sgor padma dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-29: nyi ma rnams la gshin rje mthar byed dang ;
T02TD3140E:48b-32: bgegs mthar byed rnams kyi lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-36: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-37: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-38: he ru ka rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-39: rta mchog rnams kyi ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-41: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD3140E:48b-42: sna tshogs rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD3140E:48b-43: gshin rje mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor lo ser po'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-44: padma mthar byed kyi mtshan ma'i phyir gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD3140E:48b-45: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzhi'i phyi ngos su dkyil 'khor gsum pa kho na'i zur gyi nang du re kh'a bya'o //
T02TD3140E:49a-0: de'i phyi ngos kyi gnas kyi me la sogs pa'i zur thig rnams kyi g-yas logs su gnas pa'i @49a * //
T02TD3140E:49a-1: padma dang zla ba rnams la me tog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-4: dri chab ma rnams kyi me tog gi snod dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-6: rin po che'i sgron ma'i mchod sdong dang dung ngo //
T02TD3140E:49a-7: g-yon logs su gnas ba'i padma dang zla ba rnams la rdo rje gzugs ma dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-8: rdo rje sgra ma ma dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-10: rdo rje reg bya ma rnams kyi me long dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-14: phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la padma rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-17: lus ngan po rnams kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-21: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su dbang ldan dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-24: rlung lha rnams kyi rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-28: de nas dbang ldan gyi phyi ngos dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02TD3140E:49a-29: mtshan ma rnams rim gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD3140E:49a-30: de la tshangs pa'i bgrang phreng ngo //
T02TD3140E:49a-32: dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-33: gdong drug gi shag ti dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-39: phag mo'i nya ro hi ta dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-41: bhringgi ri ti'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-42: tshogs bdag gi dgra sta dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-43: nag po chen po'i rtse gsum dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-44: dga' byed dbang phyug gi rdza rnga dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-45: nyi ma'i padma la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-46: zla ba'i kunda la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-47: mig dmar gyi gri gug dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-50: pa wa sangs kyi phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-51: spen pa'i dbyug pa nag po dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-52: sgra gcan gyi zla ba dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-53: mjug rings kyi klu'i zhags pa dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-55: rgyal bar byed pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-56: sbrang rtsir byed pa'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:49a-65: rigs ldan rnams kyis thal mo sbyar ba'am /
T02TD3140E:49b-0: yang na rang rang gi pha'i mtshan ma dang 'dra @49b ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-1: de la mtha' yas dang rigs ldan ni bram ze ste me lha'i bu'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-2: nor rgyas dang dung skyong ni rgyal rigs te dbang po'i'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-3: 'jog po dang padma chen po ni rje'u'i rigs te rlung lha'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-4: stobs kyi rgyu dang padma ni dmangs rigs te chu lha'i'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-8: rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi ral gril sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-9: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-10: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i pi wang ngo /
T02TD3140E:49b-11: dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa'i pi wang ngo ;
T02TD3140E:49b-12: / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don kun grub pa'i me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-21: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams kyi shing thog bi dza p'u ra rnams so //
T02TD3140E:49b-49: byi bzhin rnams kyi ni lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD3140E:49b-50: 'dir yang sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-51: dkyil 'khor bzhi pa la bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:49b-52: ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje phreng ba sngon po'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser po'i dbus su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ser po'o //
T02TD3140E:49b-53: shar la sogs ba'i rtsibs rnams las gnon gyi phyag rgya dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:49b-54: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya sngon po dang ;
T02TD3140E:49b-55: bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya dmar po dang /
T02TD3140E:49b-56: mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ljang gu rnams so //
T02TD3140E:49b-57: me la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la nyi ma dang yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-0: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i @50a * //
T02TD3140E:50a-2: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la sgo'i g-yon du mtshan ma gnyis te /
T02TD3140E:50a-4: der klu shing gi me tog dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-5: spyan dang bcas pa'i chu skyes dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-10: padma la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgro ma dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-11: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-13: padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-16: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i autpala dang bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-17: chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-19: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams so //
T02TD3140E:50a-20: sgo rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:50a-21: mtshan ma sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-22: mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mi bri ba yang ngo //
T02TD3140E:50a-23: 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rtsig pa lnga dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-24: shar la sogs pa'i sa ni dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-29: thig gi re kh'a gsum ni dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-32: thig gi re kh'a gcig dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-33: rdo rje phreng ba'i re kh'a gnyis ni nag po'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-34: nang gi pho brang gi dbus kyi re mig la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-35: shar du nyi ma la dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum pa'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-36: lhor nyi ma la khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-37: nub tu zla ba la tshangs pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-38: byang du nyi ma la smin drug gi bu'i shakti'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-39: dbang ldan du zla ba la tshogs bdag gi dgra sta'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-40: mer nyi ma la nyi ma'i padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3140E:50a-41: bden bral du nyi ma la sgra gcan gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3140E:50a-42: rlung du zla ba la dga' byed dbang phyug gi cang te'u'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-43: rim pa gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su dbang mo dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-46: dka' bzlog ma rnams kyi zla ba la padma dkar po dang /
T02TD3140E:50a-49: gdengs ka'i rnam pa'i lag pa'o //
T02TD3140E:50a-50: me la sogs par rin chen dpal mo dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-0: kun du 'byor pa rnams kyi zla ba @50b rnams la rim pa bzhin du dri'i dung chos dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-2: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-4: rim pa gsum par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dbang po dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-7: lus ngan rnams kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-8: nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-9: zla ba la gnas pa'i klu'i zhags pa dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-10: zla ba la gnas pa'i dbyug to'o //
T02TD3140E:50b-11: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su me lha dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-14: zla ba rnams kyi nyi ma la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-15: nyi ma la gnas pa'i ral gri dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-16: zla ba la gnas pa'i rlung ras dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-17: zla ba dang ku mu da la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD3140E:50b-18: zla ba'i mtshan ma dang nye bar dbang ldan gyi nyi ma la rtse gsum mo //
T02TD3140E:50b-19: rim pa bzhi par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su seng ge'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-22: chang 'phrog ma rnams kyi zla ba la seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-26: dbang ldan la sogs par mchog 'phrog ma dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-27: rin chen dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-29: 'gro skyong ma rnams kyi zla ba la me tog gi snod dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-34: zla ba thams cad ni sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'o //
T02TD3140E:50b-35: rim pa bzhin par bum pa rnams so //
T02TD3140E:50b-36: mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi gzhan la yas khang gi dbus su shes rab dang bas pa'i kye'i rdo rje'i gri gug dang thod pa'o //
T02TD3140E:50b-37: shar la sogs pa'i sgong dkar mo dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-40: za phod ma rnams kyi rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-44: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spos mo dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-47: g-yung mo rnams kyi byang chub sems kyi bum pa dang /
T02TD3140E:50b-50: rgyal mtshan chen po'i ba dan no //
